amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to relating to improving health programs, which may include prohibiting funding for abortions of unborn children with Down syndrome or other chromosomal conditions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3331 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 350.

action.text: Amendment SA 3331 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S6232; text: CR S6232) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to relating to improving health programs, which may include prohibiting funding for abortions of unborn children with Down syndrome or other chromosomal conditions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3331 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3331 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 350.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3331 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 350.
